column5: Can it get any better? Heading out for the weekend tomorrow for Brook Trout. I'm so pumped. Everything looks perfect so far. I think I'll pick up a 649 ticket on the way out too. Have a great weekend everyone. Be back Monday.
Tight lines! And bring a good report...
Good luck Dan !!! It'll sooth the soul.
Hope it's like glass out there and when you look into that speckie aquarium you see everyone of them swim by the boat and smash your lure.
Savour it my friend.I hope it feels like 10 days instead of 2
You hitting the ol' stocked pond? haha. Have fun on those pristine waters.
